sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import Navbar from '../../components/Navbar/Navbar'; import './CardDetailPage.css' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' function CardDetailPage(props){ const location = useLocation() const { movieContent } = location.state let author = movieContent.author; let authorImgUrl = "https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E03AQFYIhvlCLQ7fw/profile-displayphoto-shrink_800_800/0/1634408897588?e=1655337600&v=beta&t=9eu3H4crWM93UrbCh2daNc4tQywK2ZnUk4cfewU_Q8s" return(
{author.name}
{author.date}
{movieContent.title}
{movieContent.text}
) } export default CardDetailPage;
